Text: It's the real things.  Size is correct and the rar contains 9 PDFs

Thanks and can confirm that they are what they should be and for anyone who is having problems downloading the play-test this will get you what you need. It wouldn't have been needed if the original link worked properly, will seed until an official method works.
Thanks for setting up a download that actually worked; I thought I was going to get a brain tumor from the impossibly broken official site.  Now to get playtesting~
